name: Cockatrice's Drumsticks
description: Roasted cockatrice drumsticks, glazed with bbq sauce. Serverd with a whole sourdough bread.

name: Dragon's Chili
description: Spicy chili made with dragon meat, served with a side of bread sticks.

name: Crystal Bee's Honeycomb
description: Honeycomb from the crystal bees of the enchanted forest, served with butter and warm bread.

name: Doomed Sky
description: A refreshing drink made with the tears of a fallen angel, served cold and refreshing.

name: Dragon's Breath Ale
description: A strong and bitter ale made with dragon's breath.

name: Dragon Chips
description: Crispy chips made with dragon scales, served with a side of dragon's blood ketchup.

name: Dragon Omelette
description: A fluffy omelette made with dragon eggs.

name: Druid's Root Pie
description: A delicious pie made with druid's roots, mushrooms, and cheese.

name: Elven Wine
description: A sweet and fruity wine made by the elves of the enchanted forest.

name: Enchanted Apple Dumplings
description: Warm apple dumplings made with enchanted apples, sprinkled with cinamon and honey glaze.

name: Fae's Fairy Pastry
description: A light and flaky pastry filled with fae's fairy dust, served with a side of whipped cream.

name: Fruity Skewers
description: Fresh fruit skewers made with fruits from the enchanted forest, served with a side of honey yogurt.

name: Giant's Breakfast
description: A hearty breakfast fit for a giant, with sausages, bacon, eggs, and toast.

name: Hearth Mushroom Stew
description: A warm and hearty stew made with hearth mushrooms and edible flowers.

name: Unicorn's Nectar
description: A sweet and refreshing drink made with unicorn tears and sparkling water.
